scripts.build: npm run build-64 && npm run build-win32 && npm run build-linux32
scripts.build-64: npm run build-mac && npm run build-win && npm run build-linux
scripts.build-mac: electron-packager ./ 'Diane Rehm Downloader' --app-bundle-id=dianerehmdownloader --icon=images/appicon.icns --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=1.2.6 --app-version=1.0.7 && cd build/ && zip -ry Diane.Rehm.Downloader-darwin-x64.zip 'Diane Rehm Downloader-darwin-x64' && cd ..
scripts.build-win: electron-packager ./ 'Diane Rehm Downloader' --app-bundle-id=dianerehmdownloader --version-string.FileDescription='Diane Rehm Downloader' --icon=images/appicon.ico --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=1.2.6 --app-version=1.0.7 && cd build/ && zip -r Diane.Rehm.Downloader-win32-x64.zip 'Diane Rehm Downloader-win32-x64' && cd ..
scripts.build-win32: electron-packager ./ 'Diane Rehm Downloader' --app-bundle-id=dianerehmdownloader --version-string.FileDescription='Diane Rehm Downloader' --icon=images/appicon.ico --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=1.2.6 --app-version=1.0.7 && cd build && zip -r Diane.Rehm.Downloader-win32-ia32.zip 'Diane Rehm Downloader-win32-ia32' && cd ..
scripts.build-linux: electron-packager ./ 'Diane Rehm Downloader' --app-bundle-id=dianerehmdownloader --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=linux --arch=x64 --version=1.2.6 --app-version=1.0.7 && cd build/ && zip -r Diane.Rehm.Downloader-linux-x64.zip 'Diane Rehm Downloader-linux-x64' && cd ..
scripts.build-linux32: electron-packager ./ 'Diane Rehm Downloader' --app-bundle-id=dianerehmdownloader --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=linux --arch=ia32 --version=1.2.6 --app-version=1.0.7 && cd build/ && zip -r Diane.Rehm.Downloader-linux-ia32.zip 'Diane Rehm Downloader-linux-ia32' && cd ..
